channel.title: Redstone circuit disappeared
channel.description: I don't quite know what to make of this, but a bunch of red stone, torches, and blocks disappeared from my tower. When I hawked them, it seemed to say that I did it, which I didn't. No one else has my account info. Could someone else have logged on with my name or is this some weird error? Sorry if this seems like a stupid question, but I'm kind of a noob at Minecraft.

item.title: Redstone circuit disappeared
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:421166”]Hi golden1 (quickkilleb)

Why did it take so long for everyone to catch onto that?

Nation name: Pine Village
Leader: quickkilleb
Population: 3
Coords (it’s a 1000x1000 map it isn’t exactly top secret anyway): -503 -300
Do you agree to help everyone achieve a common goal of peace, and rich/fair trading to benefit us all?: yes.
Do you have any objections/comments to make?: no.

or maybe I’m just assuming because I can’t track IPs. :)[/quote]

i caught that look just under that post golden was banned and ban evaded with the user kytero he lived with quick but thats it

Read full topic

item.title: Redstone circuit disappeared
item.dc:creator: @quickkilleb quickkilleb
item.description:
@quickkilleb wrote:

The redstone wiring was there a few days ago, so I don’t think its the 14 day thing. Either way, at least it wasn’t anything serious and the culprit offered to repair it.

Read full topic

item.title: Redstone circuit disappeared

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Maybe it was over 14 days ago?

item.title: Redstone circuit disappeared
item.dc:creator: @quickkilleb quickkilleb
item.description:
@quickkilleb wrote:

I found out that someone living in my town did it, becasue he admitted it when I asked, but the hawk tool didn’t show his name so I guess it was just a glitch.

Read full topic

item.title: Redstone circuit disappeared
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

quickkilleb:

So it would be possible for someone who had been banned to log on with the name “quickkilleb” and grief things which the hawk tool would then show my name for?

No, but that could be a glitch in the system. I’ll mess around with the hawk tool and figure out how that may have been recorded wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Redstone circuit disappeared
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I do know that thelaughingbomb ban evaded so that may have had something to do with it.

How do i know? All but 2 of my chickens are dead and his name was the last person to use the trapdoor according to hawk.

Read full topic
